intj.name: Architect
intj.description: Imaginative and strategic thinkers, with a plan for everything.

intp.name: Thinker
intp.description: Innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.

entj.name: Commander
entj.description: Bold, imaginative and strong-willed leaders, always finding a way – or making one.

entp.name: Debater
entp.description: Smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge.

infj.name: Advocate
infj.description: Quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealists.

infp.name: Mediator
infp.description: Poetic, kind and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause.

enfj.name: Protagonist
enfj.description: Charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to mesmerize their listeners.

enfp.name: Campaigner
enfp.description: Enthusiastic, creative and sociable free spirits, who can always find a reason to smile.

istj.name: Logistician
istj.description: Practical and fact-minded, reliable and responsible.

isfj.name: Protector
isfj.description: Warm-hearted and dedicated, always ready to protect their loved ones.

estj.name: Executive
estj.description: Excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things – or people.

esfj.name: Consul
esfj.description: Extraordinarily caring, social and popular people, always eager to help.

istp.name: Virtuoso
istp.description: Bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools.

isfp.name: Adventurer
isfp.description: Flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore new possibilities.

estp.name: Entrepreneur
estp.description: Smart, energetic and very perceptive people, who truly enjoy living on the edge.

esfp.name: Entertainer
esfp.description: Spontaneous, energetic and enthusiastic people – life is never boring around them.

hero.title: Discover Your True Self
hero.subtitle: Connect with millions worldwide through personality insights

accurate.title: Scientifically Accurate
accurate.description: Based on decades of psychological research and validated methodologies

social.title: Global Community
social.description: Connect with people who share your personality type from around the world

insights.title: Deep Insights
insights.description: Comprehensive reports covering career, relationships, and personal growth

start.title: Discover Your Personality Type
start.description: Answer questions about how you typically think, feel, and behave. Be honest – there are no right or wrong answers.
start.privacy: Your responses are completely private and secure
